QuestData.Title: Gjalerbron Attack Plans
QuestData.Description: These plans detail an imminent attack upon Camp Winterhoof. It would appear that the frost wyrm, Glacion, who circles overhead, is to be used for the offensive.$B$BSurely Celea Frozenmane would be of some assistance in this matter. Deliver the plans to her at the camp to the east.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Gjalerbron Attack Plans to Celea Frozenmane at Camp Winterhoof.
QuestData.CompletionText: What?! Plans for an attack upon our camp?$B$BFROM A GREAT WYRM IN THE SKY?!!!
QuestData.RewardText: $n, we cannot let this come to pass!
